subject: Bank of Hawaii,
body:
Bank of Hawaii,
 ACH Operations 121, P.O. Box 71160,
 Honolulu, HI 96807-1160.
 
 
 
Dear   BENEFICIARY
 
CAN WE MOVE FORWARD AS YOUR FUND IS STILL SAFE WITH US HERE DESPITE SEVERAL REMINDERS?STILL WAITING FOR YOUR WORDS AND ACTION IN CLAIMING YOUR FUND WITH US HERE FOR SO LONG 
 
I wish to humbly inform you that the total sum of $25.82m  has just been approved for immediate release to your bank coordinates..
This notice was released this last Friday been released by the CEO, Mr. Peter S.Ho
 
Kindly make available your full bank details now for this release process.
 
IS THIS BANK DETAILS CORRECT?
 
BANK NAME IS:  ALLY BANK
BANK ADDRESS:   P.O. BOX 13625
                                  PHILADELPHIA, PA 19101
ROUTING  NUMBER IS:   124003116
ACCOUNT NUMBER IS:   2117268173
BANK PHONE NUMBER      1-877-247-2559
NAME ON ACCT: MICHAEL CRAIG RIXIE
 
Always copy my alternative email below
 
Congratulation.
Best Rgd,
HARRY MARVIN
PAYMENT OFFICE CERTIFICATION OFFICE
BANK OF HAWAII
ALTERNATIVE EMAIL  
clearanceofficerboh@gmail.com

subject: Re:    Bank of Hawaii,
body:
Hello Harry Marvin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised to hear about this fund. Could you please provide more details about it? How did it come to be in my name? And why has it been waiting for so long?

I would also like to know more about the release process. What steps are involved and how long does it usually take?

As for the bank details, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this moment. Is there any other way we could proceed with this?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Nicholas
